description: Now updated with a helpful heat-resistant ergonomic silicone handle and BPA-free resin knob, this durable stainless steel six cup coffee percolator might be your new camping buddy.Resin PercView top.18-8 stainless steel, seamless construction.Precision-fitted, three-part percolator system.Includes aluminum insert for coffee grinds.
name: GSI Glacier Stainless Steel 6 Cup Percolator
